extendedInfo.description: Long long time ago in the Stone Age, the only way to survive is to fight with other tribes for the limited land and resources. You have to master your weapons and win the epic battles to secure your leadership among the tribes!Stone Wars is a turned-based strategy game with a twist. It offers a unique gaming experience that combines strategy, platform elements and puzzle solving all-in-one. Features:- Arcade mode: turn-based missions with challenging objectives.- Realistic physics (powered by Box2D).- 3D pre-rendered fluid character animations.- Beautiful original soundtracks.
